name: Arrow Over It
description:
Description

Adventure game in which you have to use your magic bow to travel through history, across the different epochs, until you reach the Moon. In this single-player indie game you will embark on a journey in which you will discover 8 ages that marked the history of our world. You'll encounter different animals, constructions, famous characters, sculptures, inventions... and much more.

You will do all this with your magic bow, which allows you to transport yourself to the place you shoot. Beware, because just as you advance across ages, you can also go backwards.

As a wise man once said:

"Where I put the arrow I put the eye".

Characteristics:
  • Shot that transports the player.
  • Relaxing music.
  • 8 platform zones.
  • Knowing elements of the history.
  • Frustration
  • The satisfaction of putting your feet on the moon.
  • Beat your own time and beat your friends' time (speedrun).

Overcome skill puzzles to advance. Enjoy our game and send us any comments and/or questions you may have. Music credits:

Credits

Passage by Edoy https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Edoy#contact-artist

 Gravity by Edoy https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Edoy#contact-artist
